description: vet: Improve error message for trailing %.

messages.text:
Yes, I checked that I was synced before, and I've just checked again.
"hg sync" is saying "no changes found".

This is very confusing. It looks like I have no changes from the last
two days. There just be a hg failure going on somehow.

Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

The previous output for the test case was
  unrecognized printf verb '�'

I fixed this yesterday, and earlier today you had another complaint I
couldn't reproduce. Are you synced to tip?

I tried your test case in my client with an at-tip print.go and got:

x.go:7: missing verb at end of format string in Printf call

-rob

"hg sync" and "hg pull -u" didn't do anything, but somehow "hg update"
did the right magic and now I have your change locally and all is
right again. I hate hg.

sorry, no need for this CL.
CL https://codereview.appspot.com/10456044 will fix hg sync.

subject: code review 10364049: vet: Improve error message for trailing %.
